tinker:FirstDrone.NAME: First Drone

tinker:MultiTool.FLAVOR: A tiny, helpful bundle of tricks.

tinker:SnapGuard.FLAVOR: Out and ready in a flash!

tinker:Spraygun.FLAVOR: But does it spray water ... or bullets!?

tinker:LouseBGone.FLAVOR: Got a Louse in your house? No problem.

DESCRIPTIONS: #pPassive: Deal #b5 damage to a random enemy.

tinker:ScienceDrone.NAME: Science Drone
DESCRIPTIONS: #pPassive: Reduce the #rCooldown of a random #yTool on #rCooldown by #b1.

tinker:SwordDrone.NAME: Sword Drone
DESCRIPTIONS: #pPassive: Deal #b3 damage to the frontmost enemy.

tinker:PesterDrone.NAME: Pester Drone
DESCRIPTIONS: #pPassive: A random enemy loses #b1 #yStrength this turn.

tinker:FighterDrone.NAME: Fighter Drone
DESCRIPTIONS: #pPassive: Alternates between gaining #b3 #yBlock and dealing #b3 damage to ALL enemies.

tinker:AllRoundDrone.NAME: All-Round Drone
tinker:AllRoundDrone.FLAVOR: Simple and effective. Useful no matter what.

tinker:GoldenDrone.NAME: Golden Drone
tinker:GoldenDrone.FLAVOR: Gold is ineffective for combat purposes.

tinker:MirrorDrone.NAME: Mirror Drone

DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you receive attack damage, deal #b50% of that damage back. #pPassive: Gain #b1 #yBlock.

tinker:MimicDrone.NAME: Mimic Drone

DESCRIPTIONS: #pPassive: Copies the #pPassive of a random held #yDrone.

tinker:Cannoninator.NAME: Cannon-inator
DESCRIPTIONS: #pActivate: Deal #b15 damage to the backmost enemy. #b3 #rCharges.

tinker:Confusionator.NAME: Confusionator
tinker:Confusionator.FLAVOR: What was I doing again? Intending to attack?

tinker:Defensinator.NAME: Defensinator
tinker:Defensinator.FLAVOR: You shall never pierce my defenses now! Bwahaha!

tinker:Crashinator.NAME: Crashinator

tinker:ChargerDrone.NAME: Charger Drone

tinker:BoosterDrone.NAME: Booster Drone

tinker:GravityLauncher.NAME: Gravity Launcher
DESCRIPTIONS: damage and apply #b2 #yWeak to ALL enemies. #rCooldown #b

tinker:Phylactinator.NAME: Phylactinator

tinker:Orbinator.NAME: Orbinator

tinker:ImmortalArmor.NAME: Immortal Armor

DESCRIPTIONS: #pActivate: Stun a random enemy for #b1 turn. #b2 #rCharges.
